title: SET_PED_HELMET_PROP_INDEX

0x26D83693ED99291C0xA316D13F// SetPedHelmetPropIndex
void SET_PED_HELMET_PROP_INDEX(Ped ped, int propIndex);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.propIndex: The prop index to set the helmet to. Refer to SET_PED_PROP_INDEX.NativeDB Added Parameter 3: BOOL p2
codeBlocks:
// SetPedHelmetPropIndex
void SET_PED_HELMET_PROP_INDEX(Ped ped, int propIndex);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_PED_HELMET_PROP_INDEX
SetPedHelmetPropIndex(ped, 0)
